headline.main: HOUSE TO DEBATE SHIP BANS 2 DAYS; Leaders Seek Final Passage Thursday of the Senate Bill to Erase War Zones, Arm Craft SEE A MARGIN OF 50 TO 100 But Some Republicans Predict Close Vote -- Measure to Get Special Rule for Action

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 8 -- Administration leaders decided today to press for a direct final House vote on the Senate's amendments to the Neutrality Bill not later than Thursday.
abstract: Speaker Rayburn conf with McCormack; repts House will debate war zone sec; Reprs Jonkman, Mundt and Bloom comment
snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 8 -- Administration leaders decided today to press for a direct final House vote on the Senate's amendments to the Neutrality Bill not later than Thursday....
